blogs.title: Find Your Adventure
blogs.description: Now were up in the big leagues getting' our turn at bat. Didn't need no welfare states.
blogs.article: So lets make the most of this beautiful day. Since we're together. The Brady Bunch the Brady Bunch that's the way we all became the Brady Bunch. No phone no lights no motor car not a single luxury. Like Robinson Crusoe it's primitive as can be. They're creepy and they're kooky mysterious and spooky. They're all together ooky the Addams Family. Maybe you and me were never meant to be. But baby think of me once in awhile. I'm at WKRP in Cincinnati. Wouldn't you like to get away? Sometimes you want to go where everybody knows your name. And they're always glad you came. On the most sensational inspirational celebrational Muppetational… This is what we call the Muppet Show? The Love Boat soon will be making another run. The Love Boat promises something for everyone. The mate was a mighty sailin' man the Skipper brave and sure. Five passengers set sail that day for a three hour tour a three hour tour. Come and listen to a story about a man named Jed - a poor mountaineer barely kept his family fed.
blogs.author: Lindsey Raffa

blogs.title: Exploring the Jungles of Thailand
blogs.description: These days are all share them with me oh baby.
blogs.article: The first mate and his Skipper too will do their very best to make the others comfortable in their tropic island nest. So get a witch's shawl on a broomstick you can crawl on. Were gonna pay a call on the Addams Family. Here he comes Here comes Speed Racer. He's a demon on wheels. Well we're movin' on up to the east side. To a deluxe apartment in the sky. So join us here each week my friends you're sure to get a smile from seven stranded castaways here on Gilligans Isle.
blogs.author: Rob

blogs.title: Bali Baby
blogs.description: Their house is a museum where people come to see ‘em. They really are a scream the Addams Family.
blogs.article: Those were the days. And you know where you were then. Girls were girls and men were men. Mister we could use a man like Herbert Hoover again. Their house is a museum where people come to see ‘em. They really are a scream the Addams Family. Texas tea. Just sit right back and you'll hear a tale a tale of a fateful trip that started from this tropic port aboard this tiny ship. In 1972 a crack commando unit was sent to prison by a military court for a crime they didn't commit. These men promptly escaped from a maximum security stockade to the Los Angeles underground. The year is 1987 and NASA launches the last of Americas deep space probes. Just two good ol' boys Never meanin' no harm. Beats all you've ever saw been in trouble with the law since the day
blogs.author: Rob King

blogs.title: I love Hawaii, Aloha
blogs.description: Fleeing from the Cylon tyranny the last Battlestar
blogs.article: These are the voyages of the Starship Enterprise. Sunday Monday Happy Days. Tuesday Wednesday Happy Days. Thursday Friday Happy Days.Saturday what a day. Groovin' all week with you. Straightnin' the curves. Flatnin' the hills Someday the mountain might get ‘em but the law never will! And we know Flipper lives in a world full of wonder flying there-under under the sea.
blogs.author: Lindsey Raffa
